comments.author: Felix Meschberger
comments.body: The patch attached has been created relative to the jcr-rmi contribution directory.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Cool, many thanks! I browsed through your changes and everything seems to be in order. Nice work!

I'll commit the changes once svn.apache.org is back online (it seems to be down at the moment).

description:
Hi Jukka,

You contributed the famous RMI extension to Jackrabbit. Many thanks. On my way to implement an Eclipse plugin to access repositories this provides great help. Unfortunately your contribution does not include support for versioning yet.

I took the freedom to add this missing piece and provide it to you to add it to your contribution. Thanks.
summary: Patch to JCR-RMI contribution adding Version/VersionHistory support
